job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Technical Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on using and improving AI systems for customer support rather than developing or engineering them. While it involves interacting with AI and providing feedback for fine-tuning, it lacks the core responsibilities of building, training, or deploying AI models and systems.

phrases: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the process of adapting or refining existing AI models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, specifically fine-tuning.

phrases: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools, even AI-related ones, involves a development and integration aspect, aligning with 'Software Development' tasks.

phrases: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe understanding customer issues, identifying AI limitations, and integrating AI with human expertise to meet business/customer support goals.

phrases: ramp up one several products within the first month
we are aware this is aggressive
soft_skills.justification: The description highlights an aggressive ramp-up period, implying a need for rapid learning and adaptation to new products and systems.

phrases: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
close the gap by improving the AI system
Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
soft_skills.justification: The role requires analyzing complex issues, identifying AI shortcomings, providing feedback for improvement, and self-sufficiency in problem-solving, all indicative of strong problem-solving and pragmatic skills.

phrases: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
soft_skills.justification: The expectation to improve AI systems, prototype new tools, and be self-sufficient points towards a proactive, ownership-driven, and innovative approach.
